ingredients.ingredient: 1 tablespoon seafood seasoning (such as Old BayÂ®), or to taste
3 (16 ounce) packages cooked kielbasa sausage, cut into 1 inch pieces
8 ears fresh corn, husks and silks removed
5 pounds whole crab, broken into pieces
4 pounds fresh shrimp, peeled and deveined

cookingTips: Cook ingredients in stages based on cooking time: potatoes first, then sausage and corn, then seafood
Serve on a large platter lined with newspaper for authentic Low Country presentation
Have melted butter and extra seasoning available for dipping
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is a one-pot feast with multiple ingredients cooked together. How do I time everything so it finishes at the same time?
